Ocean Survival of Salmonids (BPA),Columbia River-50,Oregon,point,National Ocean and Atmospheric Administration - Northwest Fisheries Science Center,,Nutrients only measured to 3 m depth. DO sensor was added in September 2006. Surveys have run annualy in June since 1998 until present. Surveys have also ran annually in May from 1999 through 2012. Sampling in May begain in 2015 but not at transects or stations and only around Willapa Bay to the Columbia River. Surveys also ran annualy in September from 1999 through 2012. Not all transects were sampled during any moth. In may generally
column4: and in September 3 - 8 transects were sampled. Juvenile salmon and associated enkton are colleted using a nordic rope trawl in the upper  water column (around 18 m). ,Cheryl Morgan,cheryl.morgan@noaa.gov,Physical/Biogeochemical & Biological,Environmental Characterization,Fish Abundance and Prey Availability,Agency,Cruise Station,Cruise,No,Nearshore

Ocean Survival of Salmonids (BPA),Columbia River-40,Oregon,point,National Ocean and Atmospheric Administration - Northwest Fisheries Science Center,,Nutrients only measured to 3 m depth. DO sensor was added in September 2006. Surveys have run annualy in June since 1998 until present. Surveys have also ran annually in May from 1999 through 2012. Sampling in May begain in 2015 but not at transects or stations and only around Willapa Bay to the Columbia River. Surveys also ran annualy in September from 1999 through 2012. Not all transects were sampled during any moth. In may generally
column4: and in September 3 - 8 transects were sampled. Juvenile salmon and associated enkton are colleted using a nordic rope trawl in the upper  water column (around 18 m). ,Cheryl Morgan,cheryl.morgan@noaa.gov,Physical/Biogeochemical & Biological,Environmental Characterization,Fish Abundance and Prey Availability,Agency,Cruise Station,Cruise,No,Nearshore

Ocean Survival of Salmonids (BPA),Cape Perpetua-25,Oregon,point,National Ocean and Atmospheric Administration - Northwest Fisheries Science Center,,Nutrients only measured to 3 m depth. DO sensor was added in September 2006. Surveys have run annualy in June since 1998 until present. Surveys have also ran annually in May from 1999 through 2012. Sampling in May begain in 2015 but not at transects or stations and only around Willapa Bay to the Columbia River. Surveys also ran annualy in September from 1999 through 2012. Not all transects were sampled during any moth. In may generally
column4: and in September 3 - 8 transects were sampled. Juvenile salmon and associated enkton are colleted using a nordic rope trawl in the upper  water column (around 18 m). ,Cheryl Morgan,cheryl.morgan@noaa.gov,Physical/Biogeochemical & Biological,Environmental Characterization,Fish Abundance and Prey Availability,Agency,Cruise Station,Cruise,No,Nearshore

DO sensor was added in September 2006. Surveys have run annualy in June since 1998 until present. Surveys have also ran annually in May from 1999 through 2012. Sampling in May begain in 2015 but not at transects or stations and only around Willapa Bay to the Columbia River. Surveys also ran annualy in September from 1999 through 2012. Not all transects were sampled during any moth. In may generally
column4: and in September 3 - 8 transects were sampled.
